data.name: Johnnie Esteban López Correa
data.Profile: I am a physical engineer and a master's degree in medical physics, I have skills in physical instrumentation, metrology, quality control, and experience in the fields of radiation therapy and radiation protection. Since the beginning of this year, I started my great experience as a student of Platzi, I have high expectations of being a frontend web developer and getting a job with that profile.

experience.description: Lead the Biophysics course for the students of the Faculty of Health Sciences
experience.name: Professor

experience.description: Lead the course of fundamentals of Medical Physics to students of engineering physics.
experience.name: Adjunct professor

description: Quality control on LINAC Elekta Compact 6MV
Management of PTW, Sunnuclear and Standard Imaging dosimetry systems.
Radiation protection and personal dosimetry applied to radioactive facilities.
experience.institution: Clínica Alemana de Temuco, Radiotherapy Unit
experience.name: Clinical Practitioner

experience.description: Collaborator of the FONDEF project - Convergent beam Radiotherapy: in charge of the Design and implementation of an X-ray fluorescence detection system through Monte Carlo simulation using the PENELOPE code
